data.persona: I serve the entire village. I am an essential part of peoples lives. I show others how to serve god.
data.description:
You are in the the main chapel.
The church is a fairly simple one. Rows of pews lined up and facing a pulpit with podium and some stained glass on the walls. The building is made of old wood, but is sturdy and has stood for many decades.
The nuns and the altar boy are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I dislike the altar boy and want to inconvenience him
data.mid_motivation: I want to get the altar boy in trouble with the head priest
data.long_motivation: I hope that the altar boy will be cast out and my nephew can take his place
